name: Ultimate Weapon Simulator (lisaweby)
description:
Ready, set, fire! Choose your favorite weapon, load it, pull the trigger and let the fun with one of the best virtual shooting games begin! The ultimate firearms simulator for your phone or tablet made especially for gun lovers.

A variety of amazing weapons and guns are available for your fun and enjoyment. At your disposal in this gun simulator game are: a vulcan m134, flintlock pistol, revolver, a pistol, a machine gun, a sniper, a shotgun, a submachine gun and assault rifles. Head to the shooting range and try all of the weapons provided to you by eweapons and enjoy realistic gun sounds.

The advantage of this revolver and gun simulator game is that you can shoot and fire the weapons without a chance of getting hurt or injured in the process. Another important advantage of one of the greatest gun simulator games is that you can use it to learn how to shoot and use weapons. It is perfect to be used by beginners and those who are afraid of guns in real life.

Each of the weapons is interactive and is a faithful replica of a real gun. Choose the weapon, load magazines, fold stocks, cock the hammer, adjust the fire select, discharge and many other options available in the pistol simulator game.

Features of eWeapons™ Ultimate Weapon Simulator - Best Guns:

- vast collection of weapons

- authentic weapon mechanics

- realistic weapon sounds

- high-resolution graphic

- realistic fire and smoke

- vivid recoil effects

- unlimited ammo

- cool slow motion effects

- camera flash

- awesome game music
